sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHALLOP, Shalloop, or Sloop, is a light vessel, with only a small main-mast and fore-mast, and lug-sails, to haul up and let down on occasion. Shallops are commonly good sailers, and are therefore often used as tenders upon men-of-war.
